languages.text: "Это место объято грязно-алым туманом — я едва вижу дальше вытянутой руки. И черные тени ждут за каждым углом... Иногда мой дар видеть суть больше похож на проклятие".

traits.locale_text: "Это место объято грязно-алым туманом — я едва вижу дальше вытянутой руки. И черные тени ждут за каждым углом... Иногда мой дар видеть суть больше похож на проклятие".

languages.text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."
languages.original_text: "Это место объято грязно-алым туманом — я едва вижу дальше вытянутой руки. И черные тени ждут за каждым углом... Иногда мой дар видеть суть больше похож на проклятие".

traits.locale_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lurking in wait behind every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

"This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lurking in wait behind every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

"This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

"This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

"This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

languages.text: «Este lugar está envuelto en una sucia bruma escarlata. Apenas puedo ver a dos palmos de mi cara. Y veo sombras tenebrosas al acecho tras cada esquina... A veces mi capacidad para ver la esencia de las cosas parece más una maldición que un don».
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: «Este lugar está envuelto en una sucia bruma escarlata. Apenas puedo ver a dos palmos de mi cara. Y veo sombras tenebrosas al acecho tras cada esquina... A veces mi capacidad para ver la esencia de las cosas parece más una maldición que un don».

languages.text: 「この場所は汚れた緋色の霧に包まれています。伸ばした自分の手の先がほとんど見えませんね。そしてあらゆる場所で暗影が待ち構えています...たまに、物事の本質を見抜くあたくしの能力が、才能というより呪いに思えることがあります」
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: 「この場所は汚れた緋色の霧に包まれています。伸ばした自分の手の先がほとんど見えませんね。そしてあらゆる場所で暗影が待ち構えています...たまに、物事の本質を見抜くあたくしの能力が、才能というより呪いに思えることがあります」

languages.text: “整个地方都笼罩在肮脏的猩红迷雾之中。我几乎看不清自己伸出的手。每个角落都有阴影在伺机而动……有的时候，我能看到事物本质的能力更像是诅咒，而不是馈赠。”
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: “整个地方都笼罩在肮脏的猩红迷雾之中。我几乎看不清自己伸出的手。每个角落都有阴影在伺机而动……有的时候，我能看到事物本质的能力更像是诅咒，而不是馈赠。”

languages.text: « Cet endroit est plongé dans une brume d'un rouge passé. C'est à peine si je vois ma propre main. Et des ombres noires sont aux aguets dans chaque recoin... Parfois, ma capacité à voir l'essence des choses relève davantage de la malédiction que de la bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: « Cet endroit est plongé dans une brume d'un rouge passé. C'est à peine si je vois ma propre main. Et des ombres noires sont aux aguets dans chaque recoin... Parfois, ma capacité à voir l'essence des choses relève davantage de la malédiction que de la bénédiction. »

languages.text: "Dieser Ort verschwimmt in purpurrotem Nebel. Ich kann kaum weiter als meine ausgestreckte Hand sehen. Und hinter jeder Ecke lauern dunkle Schatten ... Manchmal erscheint mir meine Fähigkeit, die Essenz der Dinge zu sehen, eher ein Fluch als eine Gabe."
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Ort verschwimmt in purpurrotem Nebel. Ich kann kaum weiter als meine ausgestreckte Hand sehen. Und hinter jeder Ecke lauern dunkle Schatten ... Manchmal erscheint mir meine Fähigkeit, die Essenz der Dinge zu sehen, eher ein Fluch als eine Gabe."

languages.text: "Burası; kan kızılına bürünmüş, pis bir sisle kaplı. Uzattığım elimin ötesini anca görebiliyorum. Karanlık gölgelerse dört bir köşeye pusmuş... Varlıkların özünü görebilme kabiliyetim, bazen lütuftan ziyade bir lanet gibi hissettiriyor."
languages.original_text: "This place is enveloped in a fog of dirty scarlet. I can barely see past my own outstretched hand. And dark shadows are lying in wait around every corner... Sometimes my ability to see the essence of things seems more of a curse than a gift."

traits.locale_text: "Burası, kan kızılına bürünmüş pis bir sisle kaplı. Uzattığım elimin ötesini anca görebiliyorum. Karanlık gölgelerse dört bir köşede pusuda bekliyor... Varlıkların özlerini görebilme kabiliyetim, bazen lütuftan ziyade bir lanet gibi hissettiriyor."
